6.44: LVL? Death now also deals its bonus damage against heroes on level 25.  Aghanim's Scepter no longer increases  Doom duration from 14/16/18 to 12/14/16.
6.60: Aghanim's Scepter now increases  Doom duration again from 12/14/16 to 14/16/18.
6.66: Devour Increased creep level restriction from 1/2/4/6 to 2/4/5/6. Increassed gold bonus from 10/20/30/40 to 40/60/80/100. Increased cooldown from 30/25/20/15 to 60/55/50/45. Increased manacost from 50/45/40/35 to 60. Now gains the abilities of the target neutral creep has until another neutral creep with abilities is devoured to replace them.  Scorched Earth reworked.
6.68: Reduced base  intelligence from 16 to 13.  Scorched Earth Increased manacost from 60 to 60/65/70/75. Reduced movement speed bonus from 20% to 16%. Rescaled  LVL? Death manacost from 85/105/125/145 to 110 on each level.
6.69: Reduced base armor from 0 to -2 (total armor is now -0.46). Reduced  Doom cast range from 650 to 550.
6.05: Replaced Fire Storm with  Scorched Earth
6.06: Scorched Earth Increased radius from 600 to 700. Increased damage/heal per second from 2/4/6/8 to 2/4/6/10. Increased movement speed bonus from 10%/15%/20%/25% to 10%/15%/20%/30%. Increased attack speed bonus from 10/15/20/25 to 10/15/20/30. Reduced manacost from 60/65/70/75 to 60 on each level.
6.52: Reduced  Aghanim's Scepter upgraded  Doom cooldown from 150/120/120 to 110/100/90.
6.13: Reduced  Scorched Earth damage/heal per second from 2/4/6/10 to 2/4/6/8. Reduced  Doom manacost from 250/300/350 to 150/200/250.
6.35: Increased base armor from 1 to 2 (total armor is now 3.54).
6.36: Increased  Doom duration from 12 on each level to 12/14/16.
6.39: Added  Aghanim's Scepter upgrade for Doom: Increased  Doom damage per second from 40/60/80 to 60/80/120 and duration from 12/14/16 to 14/16/18 and reduces cooldown from 180/150/120 to 150/120/120.
6.49b: Reduced  Aghanim's Scepter upgraded  Doom damage per second from 60/80/100 to 50/70/90.
6.12: Doom Reduced damage per second from 40/80/120 to 40/60/80. Reduced duration from 18 to 12. Reduced manacost from 250/300/380 to 250/300/350. Reduced cooldown from 300 to 180/150/120
6.72d: Undid melee hero collision change from 6.72c
6.56: Reduced cast point of all spells from 0.5 to 0.3.
6.54: Devour No longer shows the devoured unit's icon and health status in the hud (it was covering Doom's stats). No longer causes Doom to be revealed while consuming the unit. Now shows an overhead indicator showing how long it takes to consume the unit. The ability is now disabled while consuming the unit.
6.79: Doom Now disables  Borrowed Time (passive activation),  Berserker's Blood,  Greater Bash and  Corrosive Skin. Reduced cooldown from 110 to 100. Now applies a normal dispel on the target upon cast, removing positive buffs.  Aghanim's Scepter upgraded duration pause radius increased from 550 to 900.
6.78: Doom: Now disables  Feast,  Backtrack,  Dispersion,  Juxtapose,  Bristleback and  Blood Bath.  Aghanim's Scepter upgrade now causes the duration to be paused as long as the target stays within 550 range of Doom. Duration continues to decease as soon as the distance gets greater.
6.72c: Melee hero collision size now reduced from 24 to 12.
6.75: Devour No longer has creep level restriction (was 2/4/5/6). Reduced gold bonus from 40/60/80/100 to 25/50/75/100. Rescaled cooldown from 60/55/50/45 to 70/60/50/40. Reduced manacost from 60 to 60/50/40/30. Increased  Scorched Earth damage/heal per second from 12/16/20/24 to 12/18/24/30.  LVL? Death Changed bonus damage from fixed 275 damage to 20% of the target's maximum health. Increased damage from 100/150/200/250 to 125/175/225/275.
6.74: Increased  LVL? Death bonus damage from 250 to 275.
6.77: Increased base armor from -2 to -1 (total armor is now 0.54).  Scorched Earth now affects every unit under Doom's control.
6.70: Reduced  Scorched Earth damage/heal per second from 15/20/25/30 to 12/16/20/24.
6.73: Increased  Scorched Earth duration from 8/10/12/14 to 10/12/14/16.
6.72: Reduced  Doom duration from 14 to 13 ( Aghanim's Scepter upgraded duration is still 14).
6.58: Increased  Devour cast range from 150 to 300. Changed  LVL? Death damage type from composite to magical. Reduced  Doom cooldown from 180/150/120 ( 110/100/90) to 160/130/100 ( 90/80/70).
6.81: Doom damage no longer ignores magical damage barriers.
6.82: Doom: Now requires  Aghanim's Scepter to apply Break. Increased cast point from 0.3 to 0.5. Changed damage type from universal to pure. Reduced damage from 30/50/70 ( 50/80/110) to 20/35/50 ( 40/60/80).
6.66b: Reduced base armor from 2 to 0 (total armor is now 1.54). Reduced movement speed from 300 to 290. Increased  Scorched Earth cooldown from 60/50/40/30 to 60/55/50/45.
